languages.text: "Не знаю, Лорд-капитан". {n}Идира ведет себя непривычно тихо.{/n} "Наказать можно, да, только смерть, это, знаете... навсегда. Мы же в Комморре не насовсем застряли, смекаете?"
"I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, Лорд-капитан". {n}Идира ведет себя непривычно тихо.{/n} "Наказать можно, да, только смерть, это, знаете... навсегда. Мы же в Комморре не насовсем застряли, смекаете?"

traits.locale_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually quiet.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. We didn't get stuck in Commorragh forever, get it?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually quiet.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. We didn't get stuck in Commorragh forever, get it?"

traits.locale_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"

traits.locale_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “我不知道该说什么，舰长大人。”{n}伊迪拉异乎寻常地安静。{/n}“你尽可以惩罚她，但要知道，死亡……就是永远地死了，可我们并没有被永远地困在科摩罗。你明白我的意思吗？”
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"

traits.locale_text: “我不知道该说什么，舰长大人。”{n}伊迪拉异乎寻常地安静。{/n}“你尽可以惩罚她，但要知道，死亡……就是永远地死了，可我们并没有被永远地困在科摩罗。你明白我的意思吗？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No sé, Lord Capitán». {n}Idira se muestra inusualmente comedida.{/n} «Sí, puede castigarla, pero es que la muerte es tan... permanente. Tampoco es que nos quedásemos atrapados en Commorragh para siempre, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"

traits.locale_text: «No sé, Lord Capitán». {n}Idira se muestra inusualmente comedida.{/n} «Sí, puede castigarla, pero es que la muerte es tan... permanente. Tampoco es que nos quedásemos atrapados en Commorragh para siempre, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}dit Idira d'une voix inhabituellement basse.{/n} Vous pouvez bien la punir, mais bon, la mort est une sentence un peu trop... définitive. Après tout, on a bien réussi à s'enfuir de Commorragh, non ? »
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}dit Idira d'une voix inhabituellement basse.{/n} Vous pouvez bien la punir, mais bon, la mort est une sentence un peu trop... définitive. Après tout, on a bien réussi à s'enfuir de Commorragh, non ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, Lord Captain." {n}Idira ist ungewöhnlich kleinlaut.{/n} "Ihr könnt sie bestrafen, aber der Tod ist ... na ja, so endgültig. Wir saßen schließlich nicht für immer in Commorragh fest."
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, Lord Captain." {n}Idira ist ungewöhnlich kleinlaut.{/n} "Ihr könnt sie bestrafen, aber der Tod ist ... na ja, so endgültig. Wir saßen schließlich nicht für immer in Commorragh fest."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「わからないわ、ロード・キャプテン」{n}イディラはいつになく沈んでいる。{/n}「彼女を罰するのは構わないけど、死は…永久よ。永遠にコモラフから出られなかったわけじゃないのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"

traits.locale_text: 「わからないわ、ロード・キャプテン」{n}イディラはいつになく沈んでいる。{/n}「彼女を罰するのは構わないけど、死は…永久よ。永遠にコモラフから出られなかったわけじゃないのでしょう？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Bilemiyorum Lord Kaptan." {n}İdira, alışılmadık derecede sakin duruyor.{/n} "Onu cezalandırabilirsin ama ölüm... Ölümden dönüş yoktur. Sonuçta Commorragh'ta sonsuza dek tıkılıp kalmadık..."
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Lord Captain." {n}Idira is unusually subdued.{/n} "You can punish her, but, you know, death is... permanent. It's not like we were stuck in Commorragh forever, you know?"

traits.locale_text: "Bilemiyorum Lord Kaptan." {n}İdira, alışılmadık derecede sakin duruyor.{/n} "Onu cezalandırabilirsin ama ölüm... Ölümden dönüş yok. Commorragh'ta sonsuza dek tıkılıp kalmadık, değil mi?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
